drawers.relaysDescription:
Relays are nodes on the network that act as intermediaries for the transmission of messages between applications.


Relays can be used to improve network resiliency and availability by allowing messages to be delivered even when there are failures or interruptions in connectivity.


Relays can also be used to improve privacy and network security, as they can hide the location and identity of applications that communicate with each other. This can be useful in environments where censorship or surveillance is an issue.


It is important to note that relays can also be used for malicious purposes, such as sniffing or censoring network traffic.


Therefore, it is important to carefully evaluate the use of relays and consider appropriate security measures to protect privacy and network security.
drawers.keysDescription: In nostr, you get two keys: your public key and your private key.
drawers.publicKeysDescription: Think of the public key as your username (like your @handle on other applications). Share it with other people so they can add you to their network.
drawers.privateKeyDescription: Think of your private key as your password.
drawers.privateKeysSnackbarDescription: Keep your private key in a safe place. If you lose it, you will not be able to access it again or recover your account.

notifications.privateMessageSendError: There was an error sending your message.

profileLoadPage.relaysDescripion: Connect with other relays if you have problems finding your data.

sendPage.imageUploadErro: There was an error while trying to upload your file

notificationsFeed.emptyDescription: Write a message to get replies and reactions.

notifications.copied:
Private key copied.

Store this key in a safe place.

profileCreatePage.warningDescription: Store your key in a safe place. If lose it, you won't be able to access or recover your profile.
profileCreatePage.label: Private key
profileCreatePage.description: Store your key in a safe place.

notifications.addContactError: There was an error publishing your changes.

contactsFeed.emptyDescriptionFollowing: Follow other profiles to see content.
contactsFeed.emptyDescriptionFollower: Share your public key so people can start following you.

repostsFeed.emptyDescription: See here the notes you reposted.

homeFeed.emptyDescription: Follow other profiles to see content.

notifications.badFormat: Relay URL has a bad format.

profileConfigPage.lud06Description: Link your identity with an LNURL or Lightning Address.
profileConfigPage.nip05Description: Link your identity with a domain.
profileConfigPage.directoryDescription:
Nostr Directory is a database of nostr public keys associated with official user accounts on other platforms. Find the people you already follow on other platforms on nostr and add your public key so that your followers can find you.

If you continue you will have to perform the verification process outside the application.
profileConfigPage.pictureDescription: Paste here the URL for the image you would like to display on your public profile.
profileConfigPage.name: Name

conversationsFeed.openMessageDescription: Paste a public key to start a conversation.
conversationsFeed.emptyDescription: Write direct messages to your contacts or others.
